attributes.action: Make compulsory that companies using 0800 numbers also display normal number
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with the rise of phone packages that include "free" calls 0800 numbers cost a significant amount that is unneccassy and are only in place for companies to make even more money. By displaying both numbers consumers can choose which to use depending on the phone package that they subscribe to.
